definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיׇּ֫גׇו]] Job 1:20; 2 ms. [[תָּגׁו]] De 15:19; Imv. 2 fs. [[גׇּוִּ֫י]] Je 7:29, [[גּׁ֫וִּי]] Mic 1:16; Inf. cstr. [[גְּזׁו]] Ge 31:19 (E) 1Sa 25:2, [[גּׁו]] Ge 38:13 (J); Pt. [[גּׁזֵז]] 1Sa 25:4; pl. [[גּׁזֲזִים]] 1Sa 25:7 + 2 t.; cstr. [[גּׁזַוֵי]] Ge 38:13; sf. [[גּׁזְַזׇי֑]] 1Sa 25:11, [[גּׁזְַוֶיהָ]] Is 53:7; —shear  sheep (obj. [[חאׁן]]) Ge 31:19, Ge 38:13, De 15:19, 1Sa 25:2, 1Sa 25:4; cf. Pt. shearer (c. [[חאו]]) Ge 38:12, also [[גּׁזְַוֶיהָ]] (i.e. [[רָחֵל]]) Is 53:7; abs. = sheep-shearer, 1Sa 25:7, 1Sa 25:11, 2Sa 13:23, 2Sa 13:24; obj. man's head ([[ראשׁוֹ]]) Job 1:20; of a woman's (fig. of Israel) Mic 1:16 (no obj.; ‖[[קרחי]]), (fig. of Jerusalem) Je 7:29 (obj. [[נֵזֶר]] q.v.)
